landing.noapp: Karekau koe e hiahia he taupānga hei whakamahi i {{ BRAND }} i runga i to waea, papa ranei! He pai te mahi a te paetukutuku i runga waea pūkoro.
landing.intro: {{BRAND}} ({{TRANSLITERATION}}) he huarahi pai ki te tutaki i nga hoa hou. Ina whakamahi koe i te {{ BRAND }}, ka kowhiria e matou tetahi atu i runga i te matapōkere ka tuku koe ki te korero takitahi ki tetahi. Hei awhina i a koe ki te noho haumaru, he ingoamuna nga korerorero ki te kore koe e korero ki tetahi ko wai koe (kaore i te tūtohutia!), a ka taea e koe te whakamutu i te korerorero i nga wa katoa. Tirohia a maatau <6>Tuhinga me nga tikanga</6>, me <8>Aratatohu Hapori</8> mo nga korero mo nga mahi me nga mahi mo te whakamahi {{ BRAND }}. {{ BRAND }} he AI ​​whakaōrite te kōrerorero ataata engari karekau he whakaōrite e tino tika ana. Ko nga kaiwhakamahi anake te kawenga mo o raatau whanonga i a raatau e whakamahi ana i {{ BRAND }}
landing.disclaimer: <0>Me 18 koe (te nuinga ture ranei i to mana whakahaere) pakeke ake ranei hei whakamahi i {{BRAND}}</0>. Tirohia a {{BRAND}} <4>Tuhinga me nga tikanga</4> mo etahi atu korero. Ko nga whakamarumaru a nga matua ka awhina pea i nga maatua kei te waatea i te hokohoko ka kitea etahi atu korero kei <6>https://www.connectsafely.org/controls</6> me etahi atu pae.
landing.pleaseleave: Tena koa waihohia a Lamdazle ka toro atu ki tetahi waahi pakeke mena koinei taau e rapu ana, a he 18 koe (te nuinga o te ture i to rohe) pakeke ake ranei.
landing.termscheck: Ma te taki i te pouaka ka whakaae koe kua arotakehia e koe he whakaaetanga kia herea e {{BRAND}}<3>Tuhinga me nga tikanga</3>, <5>Kaupapahere tūmataiti</5> me <7>aratohu Hapori</7 >.
landing.agecheck: Kare pea koe e whakamahi i tenei ratonga mena kei raro koe i te 18 tau, te pakeke ranei o te nuinga o te ture i to mana whakahaere. Tirohia a maatau <1>Tuhinga me nga tikanga</1> mo etahi atu korero. <3>Ma te taki i te pouaka ka whakaae koe ka tohu koe he 18 ou tau (te nuinga ture ranei i to mana whakahaere) pakeke ake ranei.</3>

chat.error: Hapa te hono ki te tūmau: Me ngana anō

chat.language: He reo kotahi to korua tokorua. Tīpakohia {{"Any"}} i te tahua reo hei mono.

common.talkabout: He aha taau e hiahia ana ki te korero?

alerts.keepclean: Kia ma me te awhina ma te tuku korero mo te whanonga NSFW
alerts.banreason: Na te kino o te whanonga. Kaua e māharahara, e kore e mau tonu te aukati.
